name: Dolomiti
description: Good accommodation for those wishing to stay in Venice on a low budget holiday. CQ 01/08 Plain high-rise building, red in colour. The hotel is located in the historic city centre of Venice on a quiet street in the Cannaregio district. It is only a short way from Santa Lucia Railway Station in Venice Island and from Piazzale Roma (parking and bus terminals). The area is quite lively with many shops, cafe'/bars and restaurants. A short walk away, along the so-called Strada Nova, there is also a beautiful and colourful local food market.

name: Moderno
description:
Located in a typical narrow Venetian calle, the two star Hotel Moderno offers a welcoming and friendly atmosphere and an excellent choice for a Venetian holiday. This centrally located accommodation close from Santa Lucia railway station and Ponte di Rialto , Rialto Bridge, in the Cannaregio district the most authentic Venetian area. Hotel Moderno is just a few minutes walk from the celebrated Grand Canal and less than 2 kilometres from St Marks Square, the focal point and hub of Venice. IMPORTANT NOTICE:For all arrivals in January, February and March check- in is to be made from 0800 to 2000 at Hotel Antica Casa Carettoni , located in Lista di Spagna 130, within walking distance , and closed to the Main Station and Bus Terminals. All guests will be taken to the Hotel.
A tax has been imposed by the city for stays beginning 1 October 2012, and will be collected directly at the property. The tax ranges from EUR 1 to EUR 5 per person, per night. The amount has been determined by the local administration, depends on the star rating of hotel and the season of travel. This tax does not apply from the 6th consecutive night of stay onwards, to residents of Venice City and children under 10 years of age. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For additional details on this tax please check with the hotel property at check-in.

name: Al Gazzettino
description: Welcome to Hotel Al Gazzettino; a palace of Venice's historic center, situated next to one of the most distinctive and beautiful canals of the city, close to Piazza San Marco and 3 minutes walk from Rialto Bridge and Grand Canal. Hotel Al Gazzettino, with its rooms overlooking the canal or Superior De Luxe overlooking the street ,is the ideal place for those who wants to find the ultimate in comfort, to live the historicity of the Venice, in a building of '700, fully furnished in Venetian baroque style and luxurious rooms, completely covered with precious damask fabrics.A tax has been imposed by the city for stays beginning 1 October 2012, and will be collected directly at the property. The tax ranges from EUR 1 to EUR 5 per person, per night. The amount has been determined by the local administration, depends on the star rating of hotel and the season of travel. This tax does not apply from the 6th consecutive night of stay onwards, to residents of Venice City and children under 10 years of age. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For additional details on this tax please check with the hotel property at check-in.

name: Bucintoro
description:
GeneralHotel are facing the sea and the maritime lifeblood of Venice. They have dedicated each room to an elegant sailboat, creating rooms like the Officials quarters in the unforgettable sailboats in the novels of Cecil Scott Forester and Patrick O'Brien. They have provided the best comforts and selected the name of the Doge's ceremonial boat for sea weddings, the Bucintoro. This is how Hotel Bucintoro was founded, giving Venice an elegant 4-star hotel inspired by Venice's authentic maritime tradition. And with its location, on the Docks of San Marco, on a magnificent tract of land on the banks between the Aresnale, the Naval History Museum and the Morosini Military Naval School, it could not be otherwise. Those who choose Hotel Bucintoro are selecting a splendidly located, elegant luxury hotel in Venice with all the comforts and services of an international hotel but with the carefully furnished spaces and attention to detail of a small charme hotel, to spend an unforgettable vacation in Venice.Amenity - Free Breakfast.

GeneralA tax has been imposed by the city for stays beginning 1 October 2012, and will be collected directly at the property. The tax ranges from EUR 1 to EUR 5 per person, per night. The amount has been determined by the local administration, depends on the star rating of hotel and the season of travel. This tax does not apply from the 6th consecutive night of stay onwards, to residents of Venice City and children under 10 years of age. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For additional details on this tax please check with the hotel property at check-in.

RoomTypesClassic Room - Classic Room with one double or two twin beds includes two guests in a queen-size bed or two twin-size beds. View over Saint Mark's. Elegant and comfortable.

address1: Calle Priuli Cavalletti 106/A Venice Island Piazzale Roma 30121
description:
Located in the old town center of Venice, Hotel Florida is just a stone?s throw from the Santa Lucia Train Station, in a quiet Venetian lane near the romantic Grand Canal: the city's most fascinating and enchanting street, and just a five-minute walk from the Piazzale Roma Terminal where you will find automobile parking and buses for the airports of Venice and Treviso. From Piazzale Roma you can reach Hotel Florida by crossing the Calatrava Bridge, a design touch to demonstrate that Venice is a contemporary city.
All the rooms (except one - BUDGET) have a private bathroom with shower, independently-adjustable air conditioning, heating, color TV, telephone with modem jack for your personal computer, free safe, Internet Point in the lobby with wireless access (the first 30 minutes free using our computer and free with your own computer), bar service and fax service at the reception desk. Hair dryers are available upon request.

name: Becher
description:
Rooms of classical Venetian tradition combined with a modern style are some of the special features of Hotel Becher where the sophisticated elegance of the 18th century is complemented by the most modern amenities. In the heart of Venice, only a minute away from La Fenice Theater and 10 minutes from Saint Mark' Square, you will find a charming atmosphere and impeccable service. The property also offers disabled facilities, Internet access - wireless, lift/elevator, non-smoking rooms, reception, room service and safe deposit box.

A tax has been imposed by the city for stays beginning 1 October 2012, and will be collected directly at the property. The tax ranges from EUR 1 to EUR 5 per person, per night. The amount has been determined by the local administration, depends on the star rating of hotel and the season of travel. This tax does not apply from the 6th consecutive night of stay onwards, to residents of Venice City and children under 10 years of age. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For additional details on this tax please check with the hotel property at check-in.
\nLocated 300 meters from Saint Mark's Square, 50 meters from La Fenice Theater and at 10 minutes walking distance from the hotel you will come to what has always been the commercial heart of Venice, the Rialto Bridge and the area around it.\nSingle Room - Room with one twin bed offers A/C, alarm clock, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, ceiling fan, color TV, disabled facilities, ensuite/ private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, Internet access, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, safe in room and telephone. Double/Twin Room - Room with one twin bed or one double bed offers A/C, alarm clock, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, ceiling fan, color TV, disabled facilities, ensuite/ private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, Internet access, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, safe in room and telephone. Triple Room - Room with one twin bed and one double bed offers A/C, alarm clock, bathroom amenities, cable/satellite TV, ceiling fan, color TV, disabled facilities, ensuite/ private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, Internet access, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, safe in room and telephone.

name: San Cassiano Residenza D'epoca Ca Favretto Venice
description:
Once home to the Venetian painter Giacomo Favretto, the most representative of the city's realista school during the second half of the nineteenth century, Ca'Favretto opens up from silent, shaded side streets onto a stunning view of the Grand Canal Originally built in the fourteenth-century, the home served throughout the years as residence to some of the more important Venetian noble families until 1951 when it was transformed into a pensione. San Cassiano now offers discriminating guests the timeless ambiance of a historical Venetian home with elegantly furnished rooms and the tranquil charm of one of the city's older neighborhoods. The rooms all have a private bathroom with hair dryer and towel warmer, direct-dial telephone, satellite television, minibar, radio, and air conditioning. Based on individual needs, hotel guests can chose from various types of rooms. The hotel boasts several rooms directly along the Grand Canal and the famed Ca'd'Oro. Spacious and luxurious, these rooms are not just ideal for newlyweds or romantics, but for all those enamored with the magic of Venice-the washing water, the boats gliding past, and the serenades from the gondolas that slip down the canal. Furnished in eighteenth-century Venetian style with precious fabrics, marmorino walls, mosaic floors, gold-leafed sconces and headboards, the superior rooms offer guests the possibility to sojourn in a relaxing, spacious, and bright environment overlooking the courtyard or the side canal. For those travelers interested in economy without sacrificing style and comfort, the standard rooms are the right solution while for friends and families, the hotel offers triple and quadruple rooms with complimentary cribs for children under three. The hotel offers Airport transfer, Internet access-High-Speed, bar, Lobby, Non-smoking rooms, Reception, Room service, Safe deposit box, Tour desk. Breakfast included.
A tax has been imposed by the city for stays beginning 1 October 2012, and will be collected directly at the property. The tax ranges from EUR 1 to EUR 5 per person, per night. The amount has been determined by the local administration, depends on the star rating of hotel and the season of travel. This tax does not apply from the 6th consecutive night of stay onwards, to residents of Venice City and children under 10 years of age. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For additional details on this tax please check with the hotel property at check-in.

Enveloped by the warm atmosphere that radiates its Venetian-style decor, this XVI century palace offers its guests to truly special sensations. A love nest for an exclusive and romantic getaway for two. The Hotel is presented as one of the best located hotels in Venice. name: Ca Rialto House
description:
HOTEL:This splendid, air-conditioned hotel features 17th century Venetian-style dÃ©cor and offers 9 guest rooms. Guests are welcomed in the lobby, which offers a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service, as well as a hotel safe, cloakroom and currency exchange. Wireless Internet access is available, and babysitting and laundry services are also provided.

SITUACIÃN:The hotel is conveniently situated just 500 metres from Piazza San Marco and Venice Theatre. There is a bus stop within 2 minutes' walk of the hotel. The BasÃ­lica de Santa MarÃ­a dei Frari is less than a 15-minute walk away. The beach at Venice Lido is 3 km from the hotel and Santa Lucia train station is just 500 metres away. Venice-Marco Polo Airport is just 10 km from the hotel and Treviso-S.Angelo Airport is around 35 km away.

HABITACIÃN:The guest rooms are air-conditioned with high ceilings, and feature an en suite bathroom with bath or shower, and offer a double bed. The rooms also come equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, Internet access, a safe, minibar and hairdryer as standard. The rooms also feature individually regulated air conditioning and heating.

DEPORTES:The Lido Island golf course is approximately 3 km from the hotel.

COMIDAS:A breakfast buffet is served each morning at the hotel.

It is located on the 2nd floor without lift. It is composed by a study room, a living room with a kitchenette, a double bedroom, a bedroom with two single beds and a bathroom with shower. The apartment size is about 65 square metres.Bedding:- 1 Double bed, 2 Single beds, 1 Sofa bed.Living-room:- TVKitchen: - Refrigerator, Microwave, Washing Machine, Dishwasher, Dishes/Cutlery.Bathrooms:- 1 Bathrooms with shower.General:- 2 Floor, Iron, 65 Property sqm, central heating, Air conditioned in the whole house.***Deposit (refundable): 200,00 â¬/payable on arrival.This apartment is located in a neighbourhood called Castello, probably one of the most peaceful districts in Venice, in the island of San Pietro. Castello (castle, in Italian) owes its name to the fortress that once protected the whole area, and refers specifically to l'Arsenale (navy yard), which helped Venice become the navy power that the city was well known for. Castello is mostly populated by genuine Venetians that seem to live a world away from the hustle and all the tourists that may be found in other parts of the city: the peace and quietness of this area is perfect for relaxing after a long day visiting this wonderful city.San Marco, with its magnificent cathedral, is barely a 10 minute walk away along the pintoresque Riva degli Schiavoni. The headquarters of the so-called Biennale (the cinema exhibition) are also a short walk away. Vaporetto (water bus) stops are also available nearby.Security Deposit: 200For some apartments a security deposit is strictly required upon arrival. The amount varies by property and is noted in the property description and on the Voucher. This amount will be fully refunded upon check out, provided everything is in order. Generally the security deposit has to be paid on your arrival in cash (in Euro) together with the balance.** Important **To complete your booking, you MUST register at https://www.homescheckin.com to complete your reservation and access your check-in instructions. Property ID: 4475When signing in, use the Property ID above, your Check-in Date and your Last Name.TERMS AND CONDITIONSApartment conditions: The apartment will be clean and ready to for your stay upon your arrival, and will be cleaned once your vacation is over.You are expected to leave the flat in the same conditions in which you found it. No damage is to be done to the property, the furniture and all the things inside the apartment. If you find something broken/not working properly in your accommodation please report it to the owner of the apartment as soon as possible Pets: Unless differently stated in the resort description, pets of any kind and size are not accepted. Number of people: clients cannot bring a party, including children, that exceeds the number of people stated in the booking confirmation.
** Important **To complete your booking, you MUST register at https://www.homescheckin.com to complete your reservation and access your check-in instructions. Property ID: 4475When signing in, use the Property ID above, your Check-in Date and your Last Name.Check-in Time: 14:00:00Check-out Time: 10:00:00Check-in Location: You will Check in directly at the unit you reserved and will receive check-in information approximately 30 days prior to arrival.VERY IMPORTANT: On the day of your arrival you will be met at the apartment - there will be someone waiting for you when you arrive, so we need to know your flight details or your expected arrival time at the apartment well in advance. If we know your flight details we can check whether your flight is on time or not. If you do not provide us your arrival time there will be NOBODY waiting for you. Be sure to follow the instructions to register at www.homescheckin.comTo be paid at arrival: Other Fee - 3.5

name: Appartamenti Verse
description: Nestled in the historical centre of Venice, this establishment offers simple comfort at an amazing location. Sitting at just 160 metres from The Ponte della Costituzione and 150 metres from Palazzo Mocenigo means that guests will be in the centre of the city, just minutes from all its main attractions. Piazza San Marco, the Doge's Palace, Basilica San Marco and the Rialto Bridge can all be visited just minutes after stepping out of the front door. Due to the proximity to everything the only transport that will be needed is one of the gondolas for a truly Venetian romantic evening trip between its most famous bridges and buildings.

description: This wonderful hotel enjoys a stunning setting at the heart of Venice. The spacious air-conditioned rooms feature elegant dÃ©cors and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom has modern furnishings, free toiletries and a soft bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a terrace, while others have a spa bath.Venetian style, modern design and technology blend harmoniously to make our Classic bedrooms particularly welcoming. The oak parquet floors or Venetian terrazzo flooring are a perfect match for the elegant furnishing.Our Classic bedrooms with view overlook a typical Venetian canal, the âRio Novoâ. name: Canada
description: The Canada Hotel is a real find. Not because of any luxuries it might offer, but because of its price and its location, right in the heart of Venice and exactly midway between the Rialto Bridge and the Piazza San Marco. Overlooking San Lio, one of Venice's many historical squares (Campielli), the 2-star Canada Hotel was once a typical Venetian home. Nowadays it offers a peaceful and welcoming atmosphere, combined with a helpful and personal service, and one of Venice's most sought-after locations. Guests staying at the Canada should note that the hotel has no elevator, but it does offer a great place from which to explore and discover this most fascinating of European cities.

name: Lux
description: The family-friendly city hotel enjoys an excellent location in the historic centre of Venice, near the Palazzo Ducale on San Marco Square and within walking distance of the main museums and places of interest. Guests will find links to the public transport network in the immediate vicinity and bus and train stations approximately 2 km away. The historical hotel is located around 6.5 km from the public beach and nearby airports include Marco Polo (approximately 16 km away) and S. Angelo (roughly 47 km away). The property is housed in an ancient Venetian building dating back to 1500, but it is now a modern city hotel, fully air-conditioned in the summer months, which boasts a charming ambiance and 27 comfortable rooms; the ideal place for a stay in the heart of this wonderful city. Facilities include a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out services, a hotel safe, and a cafe, bar and restaurant. For an additional fee, guests may also make use of the WLAN Internet access, room and laundry services, and a car park. All rooms are furnished in a typical Venetian style with a private bathroom with a bathtub or shower, a telephone, radio, minibar, air conditioning, satellite TV and a safe. WLAN Internet access is available for an additional fee. Each room also features a double bed, individually regulated heating, a hairdryer and a private balcony or terrace. The nearby beach is sandy. A continental breakfast is served each morning. By car, the hotel is easy to reach from Piazzale Roma or Tronchetto, where guests will find several parking facilities. From Piazzale Roma take vaporetto line 1 to the San Zaccaria stop (around 1 hour), or take line 2 for about 40 minutes.

name: Palazzo Bembo
description: Located on Riva del Carbon, in the San Marco district, an old Doge's residence, the hotel is set in a historic building right next to the Rialto Bridge. Guests can walk to St. Mark's Square in less than 10 minutes. The Rialto vaporetto stop is just outside the Palazzo Bembo. It is just 200 m to Rialto, enlivened by the famous fish market, old shops and market stalls, an extraordinary place rich with pubs and restaurants.This elegant 6-room city hotel in Venetian Gothic style provides an enchanting period residence atmosphere enhanced by its fine original furnishings, charming 19th-Century watercolours and precious Murano glass. The small and exclusive hotel offers WLAN Internet access, and guests can enjoy breakfast in the magnificent hall overlooking the Grand Canal, contemplating the passing gondolas in total intimacy. In addition to a lobby area with a hotel safe and lift access to the upper floors, further facilities available to guests at this air-conditioned establishment include a cafÃ©, restaurant and both room and laundry services.In addition to a private bathroom with a shower, bathtub and hairdryer, in-room amenities include a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, Internet access and a minibar. Further standard features of accommodation units include tea and coffee making facilities, an iron and ironing board and a double bed, as well as individually regulated air conditioning and heating units and a safety deposit box.A continental breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

name: San Gallo
description:
Within the heart of Venice, 3 Star Hotel San Gallo welcomes those who seek to be seduced by the captivating atmosphere of a city like no other in the world. The hotel is ideally located only 50 meters from St. Mark's Square, surrounded by the most important lanes of Venice, and can be easy reached thanks to its proximity to nearby boat stops. The enchanting oasis in Campo San Gallo will greet you with relaxing, comfortable interiors decorated in the traditional Venetian style. The hotel offers Airport transfer, Baby sitting service, Bar, Concierge, Currency exchange, Doctor on call, Internet access - Wireless, Laundry service, Lobby, Non-smoking rooms, Reception, Room service, Safe deposit box and Tour desk. All the costs include breakfast.
A tax has been imposed by the city for stays beginning 1 October 2012, and will be collected directly at the property. The tax ranges from EUR 1 to EUR 5 per person, per night. The amount has been determined by the local administration, depends on the star rating of hotel and the season of travel. This tax does not apply from the 6th consecutive night of stay onwards, to residents of Venice City and children under 10 years of age. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For additional details on this tax please check with the hotel property at check-in.

name: Castello
description: Excellent location, just a few steps from all the main historical sites such as the Dogi Palace, the Bridge of sighs, and San Marco square with its stunning Basilica. The hotel can assign some lovely rooms located 10 metres away from the main entrance but which benefit from the same style, treatment and facilities of the rooms in the main building. CQ 06/11 This is a traditional building dating back to the 16th century, converted in hotel since the beginning of the 1900s. The hotel offers its guests a welcome in the splendid artistic and historical center of Venice, just a few steps away from San Marco Square, close to Ponte dei Sospiri and the Palazzo Ducale. Easy to reach by Boat or Taxi craft in a few minutes, through the wonderful view of the ancient Palazzi, mirroring on the Venice lagoon on both sides of the Canal Grande.

name: Minerva E Nettuno
description: The Hotel Minerva Is Located On The Lista Di Spagna, One Of The Main Thoroughfares Of The City, 200yds From The Railway Station And 300 Yds Away From The Casino. History Our Adventure Starts Back In 1939 When The Determination Of Granpa Gigi Made Him Open A Small Inn Called Mobl Minerva, Notwithstanding The War Looming At The Horizon. Since Than, Our Hotel Now Called Hotel Minerva Nettuno Has Continued Along That Original Line, Improving And Modernizing, But Still Retaining Its Reputation Of Homely, Family-Run Hotel. After 63 Anni Gigi, The Grandson Of The Original Founder, Still Continues With That Same Determination That Is A Hallmark Of Our Group. Today, The Minerva Hotel Is Able To Provide Its Customers With An Excellent Quality/Price Ratio, Still Retaining A Homely And Simple Feel.

name: Residence Ca Pier
description:
Overview
Ca' Pier is an aristocratic Venetian private Residence located in the city centre but at the same time peaceful, near the elegant Ca' d'Oro and the Rialto.
Location
Ca' Pier is perfect for honeymoons, romantic holidays or just to visit Venice.
Rooms
The rooms of Residence Ca' Pier are provided with air conditioning, Sat-TV, free mini-bar, Wi-Fi Internet connection, telephone and safe.
Features
The inlaid floors, frescoes, furnishings, marble, Murano glass chandeliers, all authentically original, reflect and recreate the atmosphere of the Byzantine-Venetian past.
Food and Drink
The house is dedicated to the memory of a person who, by an act of love for his city and its history, intended to restore some of the splendid works as examples of the refined artistic and artisan techniques conceived and elaborated by the Serenissima (Venetian Republic) during the centuries of its independence.
Extra Information
***Children under 12 years old are not allowed in this property.***
***Please note that the check-in is at the Hotel Minerva and Nettuno, Lista di Spagna 230, 30121 Cannaregio Venezia (VE) Italy*** ***Hotels charge a nominal daily City Tourist Tax directly to the customer***

name: Villa Paradiso
description:
Staying at Villa Paradiso means choosing one of the places to stay in Venice Lido where the Venetian atmosphere mixes with a true Mediterranean charm. The island, between the sea and the lagoon, has several sporting facilities and offers you the possibility of reaching Piazza San Marco in just 25 minutes. Villa Paradiso is in Malamocco, one of the most characteristic and oldest areas of Venice Lido, a long way from the traffic and crowded streets. The Lido is a thin strip of land that separates Venice from the sea and which was already one of the most famous seaside resorts in Italy at the beginning of the twentieth century. The Lido is studded with splendid Liberty-style Villas, and is the setting for one of the most important society and cultural events in the world: the International Exhibition of Cinematographic Art. At just ten minutes from Piazza San Marco the Lido is beach for Venice and its people, full of bathing establishments and small, characteristic restaurants. Villa Paradiso is one of the few guest-houses in Venice Lido where the guests can choose from among the many sports facilities on the island: a Windsurfing club. water-skiing and sailing, tennis courts and archery, cycling paths, one of which is the famous one along the "Murazzi", and also horse-riding stables. However, Golf Club Alberoni, only 5 minutes from Villa Paradiso, with its 18-hole course, is most certainly the most famous sporting facility on the island. The Alberoni Natural Oasis with its wonderful trees and its spontaneously-growing flora, is the ideal place for a walk in the open. Also, thanks to its geographical position, the Lido is the ideal place from where to discover the lagoon's islands and to visit Chioggia e Pellestrina, small, characteristic seaside towns high up on the Adriatic coastline. For your stay on the beach, Villa Paradiso will take care of recommending the best places for enjoying the beauty of our wonderful golden beach and for those guests who want to explore the natural beauty of the Alberoni Oasis and the surrounding area of Malamocco, Villa Paradiso will provide mountain bikes and comfortable picnic rucksacks. Staying in Villa Paradiso means choosing one of few Bed & Breakfasts in Venice Lido where the rooms conjure up the beauty of the sea.

A tax has been imposed by the city for stays beginning 1 October 2012, and will be collected directly at the property. The tax ranges from EUR 1 to EUR 5 per person, per night. The amount has been determined by the local administration, depends on the star rating of hotel and the season of travel. This tax does not apply from the 6th consecutive night of stay onwards, to residents of Venice City and children under 10 years of age. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For additional details on this tax please check with the hotel property at check-in.
\nDouble/Twin Room - The charm of this villa can be found in its simplistic architecture: its modern form, the white walls and the large windows create a truly Mediterranean atmosphere. Surrounding the villa there is a wonderful, sunny garden where oleanders and fig trees provide shade for a moment of relaxation or reading and where you can begin your day eating a buffet breakfast on sunny mornings. With their modern and attractive furnishings, the rooms are large and bright and the curved wall and the aquamarine color of the floors conjure up an image of the sea. The rooms are all decorated with modern art paintings by a famous Venetian artist, and are equipped with satellite TV, direct Telephones and independently-controlled air-conditioning. Three communicating rooms provide an ideal solution for families or groups of friends. The large bathrooms are decorated in marble and mosaics. In addition to the two parking places, you can easily park your car in front of the villa. name: Graspo De Ua
description:
A few minutes walk from St. Mark's Square, the hotel is furnished after the Venitian style of the XVIII century and provided with all modern conveniences, it has also a reading, writing and bar drawning-room. The hotel is situated in the historic centre, quiet near the famous Rialto's Bridge, immortalised by Shakespeare in the play "The Merchant of Venice". The hotel also provides Bar, Internet access-Wireless, Non-smoking rooms, Reception, Restaurant, Room service.

A tax has been imposed by the city for stays beginning 1 October 2012, and will be collected directly at the property. The tax ranges from EUR 1 to EUR 5 per person, per night. The amount has been determined by the local administration, depends on the star rating of hotel and the season of travel. This tax does not apply from the 6th consecutive night of stay onwards, to residents of Venice City and children under 10 years of age. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For additional details on this tax please check with the hotel property at check-in.
\nThe hotel is situated in the historic centre, quiet near the famous Rialto's Bridge, immortalised by Shakespeare in the play: "The Merchant of Venice".\nSUPERIOR ROOM - The room offers 1 double bed or 2 single beds with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Balcony/Terrace, Cable/Satellite TV, Color TV, Hairdryer, Internet access, Mini bar, No-smoking rooms, Room service, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone. Standard Double/Twin room - The room offers 1 double bed or 2 single beds with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Balcony/Terrace, Cable/Satellite TV, Color TV, Hairdryer, Internet access, Mini bar, No-smoking rooms, Room service, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone.

description: This hotel has been well known for many years, offering a professional and friendly quality of service. Ideal for travellers with not many expectations. The hotel is located only a few metres from the train station and approximately 10 minutes walk from the Jewish Ghetto. The area is lively with many shops, bars, and restaurants and it is only 5 minutes away, by boat, from the Rialto Bridge. Also the parking and bus terminals of Piazzale Roma are within walking distance, approximately 10 minutes, or 2 minutesâ journey by boat. name: Piccola Fenice
description: As the hotel is situated in the city centre, it is very easy to reach all the services useful for guests. A few metres from the hotel, guests can find banks, the post office, a chemist's, a hairdresser's and the famous Rialto food market is a 5-minute walk away. There are also lots of restaurants in the neighbourhood. Car hire services, travel agents, museums, concert venues and art exhibitions are spread all over the city and are easily reached. The Sant'Angelo stop for the waterbus is around 200 m from the hotel and the Santa Lucia railway station is about 1 km away. Guests will find Venice Lido some 3 km away. Marco Polo International Airport is situated at a distance of approximately 24 km and Treviso Airport around 40 km away.The hotel is in a typical 17th century Venetian building and has been recently renovated. The air-conditioned establishment consists of 7 rooms, a lobby, lift access and Wi-Fi (small fee).The hotel is a small structure composed of 7 suites; all the suites have been renovated and they are furnished in old Venetian style. They have individually regulated air conditioning/heating, a safe, direct dial telephone, TV, minibar/fridge, electric kettle and coffee machine. They are also equipped with cutlery, dishes, cups and glasses to prepare breakfast directly in the room. All the suites have a private bathroom with shower and bathtub and most of them have a nice sitting room with a sofa-bed for 1 or 2 persons. The rooms are also fitted with a hairdryer, double beds and a microwave.Breakfast is not included. On request guests can have breakfast at Hotel La Fenice, a few steps from the hotel.

name: Ruzzini Palace
description: Great property in ideal position with some original fresco still visible in the Royal Suite. The style of this hotel is just unique. The restoration works took a long time due to the fact that this is a registered property and the aim was to bring back one of the most beautiful and interested palaces in Europe in 1600. This is a gorgeous palace going back to the splendours of the 17th century, when Venice was at the peak of its wealth and power. The palace was actually the residence of one of the Dogi that ruled the city. It is a stunning palace made of white carved marble that goes up to 4 floors of Baroque style. This beautiful hotel dominates the charming campo Santa Maria Formosa, one of the biggest Campi (squares) of Venice, equally distant both from San Mark's Square and Rialto Bridge, the biggest tourist sites of the city. The closest boat stops are San Zaccaria or Rialto. There is also a private pier at the hotel for access by water taxi. The area is full of life with its small local fresh food market and with its cafe bars and restaurants. Some of the best restaurants are actually just nearby. The hotel overlooks also the famous Santa Maria Formosa Church.

name: Atlantide
description:
Hotel Atlantide is a two stars hotel located in the historic centre of Venice. It is completely renewed and supplied with all modern comforts. Our staff is always at your service, kind and dedicated to your complete satisfaction. The perfect location of this hotel allows you to reach easily every part of the city; St. Mark`s square in 20 minutes, the Rialto Bridge in 15 minutes and the casino of Venice in five minutes. IMPORTANTE NOTICE: For all arrivals in January, February and March check- in is to be made from 0800 to 2000 at Hotel Antica Casa Carettoni , located in Lista di Spagna 130, within walking distance , and closed to the Main Station and Bus Terminals. All guests will be taken to the Hotel..
A tax has been imposed by the city for stays beginning 1 October 2012, and will be collected directly at the property. The tax ranges from EUR 1 to EUR 5 per person, per night. The amount has been determined by the local administration, depends on the star rating of hotel and the season of travel. This tax does not apply from the 6th consecutive night of stay onwards, to residents of Venice City and children under 10 years of age. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For additional details on this tax please check with the hotel property at check-in.

name: Palazzo Abadessa
description:
The Hotel Palazzo Abadessa Residenza d'Epoca, is a 4 star hotel located in the heart of Venice, in a very characteristic area near Ca' d'Oro, is a late 16th century Venetian relais, with frescoed ceilings, authentic period furniture, precious silk fabrics and paintings from the Tintoretto school. Guests are welcomed into the atrium with marble flooring, a wooden lacunar ceiling and polychrome windows with leaded glass that look out onto the canal, where the hotel's private docking place is situated. On the opposite side there is a magnificent spiral staircase, the only one in Venice, that leads to the first floor of the building. Official Classification of the Provincia di Venezia (administrative authority): Town House Suites 1st Category. Due to the tipology and the level of services offered, Venere.com compares the property to a 3 star Hotel.
A tax is imposed by the city and will be collected at the property (check Mandatory Fees and Taxes section for fee details). This tax does not apply to residents of Venice City and children under 10 years of age. Further exemptions may apply, subject to submission of proper documents to the property, to patients, their companions and people staying in the city for specific purposes/duties. 30% reduction applies for 2013: from 1 to 31 January and from 1 to 31 December.
The Hotel Palazzo Abadessa Residenza d'Epoca, is a 4 star hotel located in the heart of Venice, in a very characteristic area near Ca' d'Oro, is a late 16th century Venetian relais, with frescoed ceilings, authentic period furniture, precious silk fabrics and paintings from the Tintoretto school. Guests are welcomed into the atrium with marble flooring, a wooden lacunar ceiling and polychrome windows with leaded glass that look out onto the canal, where the hotel's private docking place is situated.

name: Antigo Trovatore
description: This family-friendly city hotel is located just behind St Mark's Square, in the heart of Venice. It is easily reached from the central docks of Riva degli Schiavoni which open out from the Calle delle Rasse alley. This historic street has been known since the mediaeval period for its shops selling lana rassa, a rough wool, used for the covers of the gondolas (felze). Guests will find restaurants, bars, shops and links to the public transport network in the immediate vicinity and nearby attractions include Rialto Bridge, S. Zaccharia and the Tower Bell. The lido of Venice is approximately 3 km from the business hotel, as is the main train station. Built in 2009, this recently renovated historical hotel offers a cosy and comfortable environment, as well as a patio from which guests can admire the rare beauty of the Venice rooftops during the summer months. The air-conditioned city hotel offers 25 rooms in total and welcomes guests in a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out services, a hotel safe and lift access. Further facilities include a hotel safe, breakfast room and WLAN Internet access. All rooms feature a contemporary style and are fully equipped with flat-screen satellite TV, broadband Internet access (wireless or cable). They are spacious and bright and some of them feature a terrace facing the Doge's Palace and the Bell Tower. Each room additionally features an en suite bathroom with a shower, bathtub and hairdryer, a double or king-size bed, a direct dial telephone, safe, mini fridge and individually regulated air conditioning and heating. All rooms are suitable for disabled guests. Guests may relax on the sun loungers. Sun loungers and parasols are also provided on the nearby sandy beach. Breakfast is served each morning.

name: Corte Contarina
description: This is an excellent new property, charming and intimate. There are not many rooms at this hotel which is a benefit to those guests that demand a high quality of service and constant attention by a professional and friendly staff. The rooms look superb. CQ 03/08 This is a 3-storey building totally renovated and brought to its former glory. There is no lift. The hotel is situated in a quiet area off the livelier Via Garibaldi full of the everyday life of the Venetians, with its traditional shops and colourful markets. The hotel is approximately 10 minutes walking distance, and 2 stops by boat line number 1, from San Marco square. The boat stop is called Giardini and it is close to the Naval Museum of Venice. Through a nice walk along the Gardens of Venice (Giardini), off in Via Garibaldi, towards San Francesco da Paola Church, down the little street that recalls the name of the church, is the Corte Contarina.

description:
Ideally located, right in the heart of the city?s historical centre. The Salizzada San Lio, the dynamic strip upon which this three stars hotel is situated, is just a few hundred meters from the Rialto Bridge, the oldest bridge spanning the length of the Grand Canal, and just a 3-minute walk away from the famous Piazza San Marco, or St. Mark?s Square, where the most famous monuments and museums of Venice are to be found
Immerse yourself in the charm of an old Venetian home by staying in one of the 32 rooms of the hotel. Furnished in typical Venetian style, with glasses and mirrors from Murano, all the rooms are equipped with every modern comfort. name: San Simeon Apartments Hotel
address: Riva Degli Schiavoni Calle Del Cagnoletto 4084
address1: Riva Degli Schiavoni Calle Del Cagnoletto 4084
description:
San Simeon Apartments is located amongst Venice's popular shopping district, just a short stroll from Arsenale Vaporetto Station. It is situated a brief walk from the Doge's Palace, St Mark's Campanile and St Mark's Basilica.

There are a range of facilities available to those staying at Apartments San Simeon, including a concierge, a tour desk and babysitting/child services. The in-house spa provides a variety of facial and body treatments.

After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned apartments. All provide a telephone and an in-room safe.

A satisfying breakfast is available each morning, and there are also numerous cafÃ©s and eateries close by.

Set in the Veneto Wine Region, those staying at San Simeon Apartments can sample the region's specialties and everything it has to offer. The property is also located near the area's popular establishments, and Venice Biennale, Piazza San Marco and the Museo Correr are within walking distance.

name: Palazzo Vitturi
description: The hotel is located in one of the most exclusive districts at the heart of Venice and affords view out over the Campo Santa Maria Formosa and the cathedral. It is just a short walk to St. Mark's Square and the Rialto Bridge (approximately 400 m away) as well as an array of the city's top sites including the Doges Palace, the Canal Grande and the famous gondolas. The lagoon and sea may be reached by public transport in around 20 minutes and it is about 40 minutes to the railway station whilst Verona may be reached in around 1.5 hours. Venice Marco Polo Airport is 7 km away and Treviso S. Angelo airport is 26 km from the hotel.The completely refurbished hotel is situated on the noble floor of an ancient 13th century Venetian palace, where guests may admire the Gothic architecture, typical Venetian flooring and evocative and magnificent original frescos. Located along a main street, the air-conditioned, family-friendly historic hotel comprises 9 rooms spread over 2 floors. The friendly and professional staff are on hand to provide all the necessary information. Amongst the facilities count a foyer with a 24-hour reception desk, a safe and a currency exchange desk in addition to a breakfast room.All the rooms are spacious, elegantly furnished and feature a private bathroom with hairdryer and telephone. Furthermore, all are equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, Internet access, a minibar, a double or king-sized bed and a hire safe. Individually controllable heating and air conditioning come as standard. The spacious and comfortable double rooms superior are adorned with original frescos. The very exclusive and particularly spacious suites offer a private terrace with enchanting views over the square and the church.The nearest golf course may be reached in 25 minutes by making use of public transport.Guests may select their continental breakfast from an ample buffet; it is possible to book a bed and breakfast only stay.
